text: وَإِن كَانَ قَمِيصُهُۥ قُدَّ مِن دُبُرٖ فَكَذَبَتۡ وَهُوَ مِنَ ٱلصَّـٰدِقِينَ

translation.en: But if his shirt is torn from the back, then she has lied, and he is of the truthful
translation.id: Dan jika baju gamisnya koyak di bagian belakang, maka perempuan itulah yang dusta, dan dia (Yusuf) termasuk orang yang benar
